title: New: *NSYNC – Bye Bye Bye (Balam Acab Remix)
body:
**\*NSYNC’s** _Bye Bye Bye_ was on the first ever Now CD I bought; I think it was round about the 40 mark, although I could be wrong.

Either way, quite frankly, it’s one of the best songs ever written, so when I saw **Balam Acab** had tried his hand at reworking this classic track, I was rightfully skeptical. Anyway, instead of being the soundtrack to a Year 4 school disco, this remix is more likely to feature in all the ‘cool trance clubs’ near you… Does it work? Sort of. Is it interesting? You bet. Check it out below.
